definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Plants take up CO2 and store carbon in their biomasses.
sentences.chinese: 植物吸收二氧化碳並存儲在植物生物量中。

sentences.english: Biomass may also include biodegradable wastes that can be burnt as fuel.
sentences.chinese: 生物量還包括能夠當作燃料燃燒的可降解廢料。

sentences.english: This paper centers on the biomass and afforestation prospect of pine plantation in northwest Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了晉西北汕松人工林的生物量與營林前景。

sentences.english: The stand of big density has a larger quantity of living beings and net productivity .
sentences.chinese: 密度大的林分，生物量和淨生產力也大。

sentences.english: The coupling and alternating effects between water and N on the biomass exist obviously.
sentences.chinese: 氮和水的耦合作用對洋白蠟生物量影響明顯。

sentences.english: The bial mess presents all plant and tree growth.
sentences.chinese: 生物量代表所有植物和樹木的生長。

sentences.english: The contents of mycelium biomasses and rough polysaccharide on the submerged fermentation of six agaricus blazei strains were studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 不同菌株深層發酵的生物量和粗多糖含量變異很小。

sentences.english: Fertilization at2 applications in fall got more underground biomass than that at1 application.
sentences.chinese: 秋季2次施肥比1次施肥更有利於地下生物量的累積。

sentences.english: In this paper, the biomass structure of Pleioblastus amaruspopulation in Yuhang was studied at the level of community.
sentences.chinese: 從羣落水平上研究了餘杭苦竹種羣的生物量結構。

sentences.english: The increase of DCW is associated with the improvement of HMP pathway flux.
sentences.chinese: 細胞生物量的提高與HMP途徑物流增加有關。

sentences.english: Cellulosic biomass feedstock is inexpensive and plentiful.
sentences.chinese: 纖維素生物量的供料是廉價和豐富的。

sentences.english: Impact of backwashing on biomass growth in biological active filter was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了反衝洗對生物活性濾池生物量的影響。

sentences.english: Currently, wood fuels are still the primary source of energy for approximately 2 billion people in poor countries. Solid biomass is associated with respiratory problems caused by indoor smoke.
sentences.chinese: 由室內煙氣引起的呼吸道問題同故態生物量有關。

sentences.english: Root biomass was not significant difference among ramets along primary stolon.
sentences.chinese: 根的生物量在各分株間無顯著差異。

sentences.english: The biomass and iron content of iron-enriched yeast were measured.
sentences.chinese: 測定富鐵酵母生物量及鐵的含量。

sentences.english: It is crucial to make efforts in increasing plant biomass to enhance soil organic carbon storage.
sentences.chinese: 增加植物生物量，可以增加土壤有機碳貯量。
